All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ADataMapper<E>
Abstract class following a DataMapper pattern
ChessBoard
Class responsible for building the board, turns and timers
ChessGame
Class responsible for building an entity of a game of chess with two players and a list of moves
ChessGameDM
Class responsible for the persistence of a ChessGame instance
ChessMove
Class responsible for the creation of a move of chess
ChessPiece
Class responsible for creating the chess pieces
ChessPieceKind
Enumerate class responsible for the ChessPiece kind
ChessPlayer
Class responsible for building an entity of a player
ChessPlayerDM
Class responsible for the persistence of a ChessPlayer instance
ChessPosition
Class responsible for checking a ChessPiece's position and verifying their alignments
Color
Enumerate class responsible for the ChessPiece color
IDataMapper<E>
Interface class following a DataMapper pattern
IllegalMoveException
Subclass of Excpetion
Responsible for the throwable error of an illegal move in a ChessGame
Main
This is the main class, it will create the EntityManagerFactory
Menu
Class responsible for the main menu of the game
Table
This class is used to aid on constructing a table of contents
